snippet.title: The Witch's Night Watch (Gameplay Trailer)
snippet.description:
Gameplay trailer of the game "The Witch's Night Watch" by Shay Markanty.

🔮 Your nightly duty awaits you...
Guard the graveyard from mischievous ghosts that rise in the darkness.

🕯️ Spells and Shadows:
In the dead of night, ghosts emerge.
Cast magic spells in cauldrons or summon your loyal allies to repel the spectral invaders.

🧹 Ride a Broom:
🪄 Glide through the moonlit graveyard on your trusty broom, setting fire to anyone who dares chasing you.

🌟 Survive the Night:
Engage in one-minute levels of enchanting challenges. 
Level up and adapt to buffs and nerfs, as you strive for the longest survival streak.

Suitable for all ages.

Download for Windows or XBox:
https://apps.microsoft.com/detail/9MW3C5GNB7X0?hl=en-US&gl=US
